description: Try our easy to follow Mini Oreo Cheesecakes recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Mini Oreo Cheesecakes Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1.5 cup cream (save 0.5 cup, whipped, to decorate)
200g white chocolate, melted and cooled slightly

recipeInstructions.text: Process 250g of the biscuits to a fine crumb in a food processor. Add the melted butter to the crumbs then pulse to combine.
Line a 12-hole medium muffin tray with paper cases. Place 1 tbs crumb mixture into each case and press evenly over base. Put in fridge to chill.
Meanwhile, dissolve gelatine in 1/4 cup boiling water. Beat the cream cheese, sugar and vanilla in a large bowl until smooth. Beat in the cream, gelatine and chocolate until combined.
Chop remaining biscuits and stir through the mixture. Spoon over crumb bases and chill until firm. Decorate with whipped cream and strawberries. Serve.
